    Wrapper for bukkit scoreboard to deal with i18n

    Author:
    Valentin Chassignol (Vinetos), <vinetos@islandswars.fr> Created the 30/12/2017 at 13:02

        parameters - global i18n parameters

        the current scoreboard

      • addPlayer

        void addPlayer​(IslandsPlayer player,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Object> translatableLineInstance)
        Create this scoreboard for this player, it will use the given map to get Function.apply(Object) parameters, according to each line generic type
        Parameters:
        player - a player to open this scoreboard
        translatableLineInstance - reference line (int id) and instance

      • addPlayer

        void addPlayer​(IslandsPlayer player,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Object> translatableLineInstance,
               java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Object[]> customParameters)
        Create this scoreboard for this player, it will use the given map to get Function.apply(Object) parameters, according to each line generic type
        Parameters:
        player - a player to open this scoreboard
        translatableLineInstance - reference line (int id) and instance
        customParameters - title personnal parameters
